_sText:
de_guard map for CS:S is a port of the de_guard map from the Counter-Strike: Global Offensive game.

Unfortunately, the Map has a low fps, because the author forgot to optimize the Map.

Map script

A new restaurant is opening in the Czech city, and Lord Uilayam himself was invited to open it.

But the terrorists are going to blow up the beer delivery truck to ruin everyone's holiday.

The map was created by Austrian player poLemin alone. It was added to the workshop on September 27 at 14:18, even then it was possible to try it.

During this time, the map received 6 updates, which allowed it to become one of the new map operations.

Appearance of map

The map does not stand out for its beauty from the rest, but it is pleasing to the eye.

Nice lighting, no acid colors, no unnecessary details that will reduce the fps.

As if he was in the Czech Republic, among their age-old architecture.

Geometry of map

Since the map was created for the “partners” mode, it is quite small in size. It is quite easy to navigate on it after 5 minutes of the game. On the sides there are two paths to the site, and a small balcony from which you can fall directly to the point of the bookmark.

Game strategy

CT can be squeezed in the back through the tunnel, so you should be on the watch.

When entering the site, check the sand and the water

When entering the shorts, check under the stairs, because there may be a CT

When playing as a CT, do not be afraid to press your opponents, there are many opportunities for such a maneuver on the map

Throw hammers on the car, because there often sits kt.
